item.title: Acceptable Use Policy
item.description: Acceptable Use Policy (APU) for Bellevue College Information Security Club PROXMOX VM Acceptable Use Introduction This Acceptable Use Policy (“APU”) is a legal agreement between you (“BC InfoSec Club Member”) and the InfoSec Club at Bellevue College (“BC InfoSec Club”) regarding your use of the PROXMOX virtual machine servers (“Resources”) provided by the BC InfoSec Club.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: InfoSec Club Privacy Policy Effective Date: 11/09/2024 This Privacy Policy outlines how the Cybersecurity Club at [College Name] (“we,” “our,” or “the Club”) collects, uses, stores, and protects your personal information.
